summary: Adds a new follower to Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod ever so any and all constructive criticism is appreciated :)

adds a wood elf named Freya to the sleeping giant inn. all u have to do is ask her to follow you and thats it plain and simple, i modeled her after Faendal and she specializes in archery, 1-handed, and light armor and her level also scales with the player up to 80 so she can be a valid late game follower

Mods i used for specific look:
Bright eyes 1.3
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2464
(u just need the wood elf eye if your picky about the eye pack you use)
Cover Women
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
(type 4)

the only small issue you might (most likely will) have is that the head colors don\'t match the body color
this is a weird CK issue that a lot of the modding community has been having and no one apparently knows how to fix yet, but Beth is looking into the whole issue

===========================================

Future Plans:

- a new tank follower
- possible spell-sword follower
- I\'m going to attempt a mini centurion pet (won\'t replace follower)

=============================================================
Tips for making your own follower:

in factions make sure u have 
PotentialFollowerFaction = 0 (from what i read this gives u the \"i need your help\" dialogue) 
CurrentFollowerFaction = -1 
in relationships make a new form and in the \"Child\" field go all the way to \"P\" and find Player then set your relationship to what you see fit (i suggest Ally) 
and make sure in \"scripts\" you add \"CarryActorScript\" this lets you open the npc\'s inv if not then it just sends u back to the dialogue choices 

im not sure if you need it but if that still doesn\'t work add \"DunPlayerAllyFaction\" to factions
author: xxwarcryxx
